hexagonit.form Installation
===========================

 * When you're reading this you have probably already run 
   ``easy_install hexagonit.form``. Find out how to install setuptools
   (and EasyInstall) here:
   http://peak.telecommunity.com/DevCenter/EasyInstall

 * To use the package, simply make sure that it is in the python path
   of your Zope instance and import from it in your code.

 * See the doctests in ``orderable.txt`` for detailed examples.
